reviewText: I BOUGHT VOL.3 OF ADAM "PIT BULL" HUTCHINS,"DIRTY STREET FIGHTING" AND WAS SO IMPRESSED BY IT, I HAD TO BUY THE 5 VOL.SET! ADAM TAKES HIS TIME AND EXPLAINS EVERYTHING TO YOU ON HOW TO DO A MOVE AND WHY TO MOVE IN A CERTAIN MANNER. HE TAKES EVERYTHING SLOW AND EASY SO EVEN SOMEONE WHO KNOWS NOTHING OF MMA PROCEDURES CAN EASILY PICK IT UP. I HAVE ALOT OF MMA DVD'S BUT BY FAR THIS IS MY FAVORITE!! IF SOMEONE WANTS TO LEARN MMA I SUGGEST THE 5 VOL.SET AS YOUR STARTER SET.YOU WON'T REGRET IT!!!
